servinfo.title: DTC P2142: Exhaust Gas Recirculation Throttle Control Circuit High Malfunction

item.ptxt: EGR valve data initialization procedure is required when the EGR valve is replaced.
The “EGR valve initial offset” and “EGR valve last offset” parameters must be reinitialised.
Refer to EGR Valve Data Initialization to carry out this programming.
This fault can result in a rapid and significant fouling of the diesel particulate filter. If the EGR valve needs to be replaced to deal with the fault, it must be cleared.
Conditions for applying fault finding procedures to stored faults:
The fault is declared present after a road test.
The EGR and turbocharging functions are inhibited.
The Injection warning light (gravity 1 warning light) is lit.
Use service wire for any operation on the ECM connectors.

entry.ptxt: Check the connections of the EGR valve

item.ptxt: Check the operation of the EGR valve:
Perform Test 7 referring to Test 7: Exhaust gas recirculation valve .
If the valve is jammed or irrevocably seized, replace the EGR valve.
